Hydras:

"My dear and Brave Maxima"said the male while he took her hand"Your 
Loyalty will have a big rewarded. Belive it or not, I can apreciate 
a real Loyal Decepticon... I never treason a decepticon who's fully 
loyal to me... "and said with a diferent tone "We can destroy 
together Maximal with their patetic ancestors, but we need to know 
where the Ark is... and know what Maximals knows about the ark "

fusion 
> > to create me, it's there... I should be very caution If I don't 
like

be 
> > sure that anything happen to my old form"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> Her optics turned back to him & she smiled. "There is another 
issue that we 
> agree upon." 
> 
> "I have a feeling that those on Cybertron are wishing otherwise. & 
may make 
> sure something happens here." 
> 
> She turned to face Hydras. "I swore my allegiance to Megatron & 
the 
> Decepticons at the beginning of the Great War. I have never 
wavered from that 
> oath. I never shall. Megatron gained my loyalty. & now.. you, too, 
shall have 
> my full loyalty." she was dead serious. & her voice reflected that.
